responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "ACC7D7F640A74F3D529B438A18897A04", "A drop is all I need to feed Ardis with enough power to allow me to venture backwards without turning my body to dust. Until then I shall send a Pulsanium Golem back with directions. If my calculations are correct, he will arrive at 2A-2125, allowing him the opportunity to track down the Lamp of Malgus and lock it safely within the chrono-safe. There it will remain until time brings it to me.  ")
name: MIDD_0015_AAV_ClockworkCodex_15
